# '''The Wise''' was a title claimed by [[Saruman]].
# '''The [[Wise]]''' was a title given to the greatest [[Elves]] of [[Middle-earth]] and the chief [[Wizards]], who formed the [[White Council]] in the [[Third Age]].
# '''The Wise'''  were persons esteemed among [[Men]] for their knowledge of lore. This epithet is referenced in [[Athrabeth Finrod Ah Andreth]]. Members include [[Andreth]] and [[Adanel]].
# '''The Wise''' was also a title of [[Turgon]], [[King of Gondolin]].
# A descriptor applied to [[Nerdanel]]
